divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking along a rural road with my nephew looking for pieces of wood tomake xmas gifts. i noticed what i thought was a bright star in the skyin thesouth and pointed it out to him, saying look at that bright star,maybe its thesame xmas star that appeared when jesus was born. we walked back to our housebecause it had gooten dark outside. i noticed that the light had moved from itsposition in the sky, and was now in the western sky. it was hovering over afield, which was behind our house. i told jeremy that i was going to goinvestigate it,since we had seen lights and strange shaped crafts in the samearea before. jeremy decided he wanted to come along, and my moms dog followedus.to get to the field,we had to walk up a wooded hill,which was a few hundredfeet up and then we entered the field, which was covered in snow. the weatherwas very cold,but the sky was clear. the light was hovering above the treetopson the opposite end of the field.all of the dogs in the neighborhood werebarking.as we stood staring at the light,it began to turn color,and became apurple colorlike the color of a florescent blacklight.it also grew in size. thenthe light started changing shape,as if it was morphing.two of the shapes iremember was a five pointed star,and a pyramid.these shapes were not solid,butwere 3 dimensional grids,and seemed to be made of a laser light-and was alsopurple.then the light shaped itself back into a ball, and a purple light beganto surround us.at first it was just around us,but soon it covered the wholefield. we were looking at this, and i noticed other lights in the sky. thesewere smaller red lights that blinked.they were also hovering above the field,butwere surrounding the area.there were 3-4 of these.when i looked back at thepurple globe,i saw what appeared to be people standing on top of it they weremoving about, and waving.i asked jeremy if he saw what i did, and he said thathe saw people waving at us too.there were about 4-5 figures.then one of thefigures broke away from the globe and its occupants, and began floating slowlydown toward us. our dog ran and hid in the woods,and my nephew was gettingfrightend. i told him if
